name: @keepkey/device-protocol
description: The proto buffer files from the KeepKey device, packed for consumption by the client.

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:json && npm run build:postprocess
scripts.build:js: protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:./lib --ts_out=./lib exchange.proto types.proto messages.proto messages-eos.proto messages-nano.proto messages-stellar.proto
scripts.build:postprocess: find ./lib -name "*.js" -exec sed -i '' -e "s/var global = Function(\'return this\')();/var global = (function(){ return this }).call(null);/g" {} \;
